item.description:
Welcome to Monthly Movies!

Are you open minded about art, books and culture? Well... if so... this is a great way to continually be exposed to a diverse array of indie films, documentaries and some highly acclaimed mainstream movies once a month.

Once a month let's head out in a group earlier in the week or on weekend afternoons to see a film. Why then? You won't ever have to deal with large crowds and movies being sold out :]

I'm taking movie recommendations. So please send me your suggestions. Thanks...!

Either before or after movies... people can grab a drink and/or something to eat. After the film, people can hangout to discuss what they've just seen. It's all up to you.

Movie Theaters will be in Boston, Brookline, Cambridge and Somerville. And the goal is to always mix things up by seeing a diverse array of indie films, documentaries and some mainstream movies. IMAX/OMNI Theater will also be included into the mix.

Cheers,
Michael
